newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Rugby union-Brumbies name unchanged side for Super 12 semifinal.
newsitem.headline: Rugby union-Brumbies name unchanged side for Super 12 semifinal.

text.p: ACT Brumbies coach Rod Macqueen has named an unchanged side to face Wellington in the Super 12 semifinal at Bruce Stadium on Saturday.
The Brumbies earned the right to host the game by finishing second in the Super 12 standings after beating the Hurricanes in New Zealand on Sunday.

ACT - Stephen Larkham; Mitch Hardy, James Holbeck, Pat Howard, Joe Roff, David Knox, George Gregan; Troy Coker, Brett Robinson (captain), Owen Finegan, David Giffin, John Langford, Ewen McKenzie, Marco Caputo, Patricio Noriega.
